About.weare:
Caken Paken - the vision of the strong in spirit. This is unique team of the professionals that directly involved in creating powerful stories and documenting the strength of Ukrainian cultural communities. Caken Paken supports its heroes. They live on the edge of mutual synergy of inner strength and extreme to demonstrate to the audience significant activities of robust citizens. 
 To amaze and inspire, to engage the viewers through first-hand experience, to tell stories and help to feel the presence - are the main goals. The mission of the project is to open new horizons of beauty in Ukrainian culture and to celebrate the ethnic character.
About.yes: Yes! This promotes alternative recreation, extreme sports, and tying conscious values.
About.no: No! It's not about the perfect picture of life.
About.style:
It's about style, devotion, the smell of freedom, the desperation and furious actions of the unconquered. We don't just create a film - we help open the door to a world where impossibility is just a word in a dictionary.
We promise, your inner flame will ignite, and the desire to create and fight with a sense of fear will definitely increase.
 Stay with us to do great things TOGETHER!

Common.open: We are open to new projects!

Projects.mindS: The mind is no longer here
Projects.mind: Short Film ‘’The mind is no longer here’’
Projects.textM:
Confused feelings, difficult choices and sadness for their native land. All this and a little more - the author's short film "Thoughts are no longer here.." The story that almost every Ukrainian lived. 
Who were forced to become victims of the invasion and were forced to choose between their homeland and an uncertain but safe future in another country.
 
The heart calls home, and the mind warns: be safe!.
 What will the main character choose?.
 The result of this internal conflict will reveal the true price of choice.
Projects.textB: A documentary journey into the world of help and commitment, where ordinary people become real heroes called volunteers. You will see what a day looks like outside of our reality. We will show several communities and front-line zones, when all the pain, despair and cruelty of the war are revealed with our own eyes.
Projects.titleB: Today, volunteers are the most powerful part of Ukrainian society. And we offer you to dive a little into their "ordinary" life. To remember, at the moment of morning coffee in your favorite coffee shop, its true price.
Projects.textF:
To see the world through the eyes of our team means a complete immersion in strong emotions, a passion for extreme sports, which awakens a burning life-giving fire and gives a real feeling: "Free, and therefore - alive!"
A rich selection of frames will take you to the snow-covered slopes of the mountains and make you part of a great adventure, provide unforgettable impressions and inspire new achievements.
After all, we believe that "now" is the best time to do important things from which you will receive an electric charge.
Projects.title:
So, what exactly prompted the despair to explore the Ukrainian and internal horizons - you will learn in our documentary Montis Momentum
Reveal the spirit of real life on the verge with CAKEN PAKEN!
Projects.textT: Laced up sneakers and said goodbye to the comfort zone, taking the challenge 56 kilometers. The film will reveal to you not only the amazing aspects of trail running, but will also allow you to touch the emotional trail and sources of unforgettable memories that this running discipline carries with it.

Support.textFund: The Olympic Circle Charitable Foundation was officially founded on May 25, 2022. The organization was created by athletes to help the Mykolaiv Oblast in the fight against the Russian invaders. We started our work as volunteers from the first days, and then decided to join forces in the Olympic Circle, because as athletes we understand that only teamwork will be successful.
